formattedAddress: Lincoln Center, 140 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: Lincoln Center, 140 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

editorialSummary.text: Official gift shop of the Metropolitan Opera, offering CDs, DVDs, jewelry, apparel & kids' items.

originalText.text:
Visiting the Met Opera Shop was an absolute delight. There were many wonderful items that piqued my interest. The shop was also very clean and organized.

But what truly set this experience apart was my conversation with a fellow staff member, Jaydon. His assistance was invaluable - he was incredibly helpful and ensured I found everything I needed. His customer service was top-notch, and his personable nature made my shopping experience even more enjoyable.

I highly recommend stopping by the Met Opera Shop!

originalText.text: Great shop with a lot of details to buy beside the fantastic opera of New York.

text.text: Great shop with a lot of details to buy beside the fantastic opera of New York.

originalText.text: There are so many fascinating and beautiful things on sale. I really enjoyed looking through everything and further understanding the culture of the ballet and opera. I have been in there several times, and most of the sales ladies and gentlemen are very helpful and kind. Unfortunately, my memory is forever tainted by one saleswoman who was a bit insulting. I asked if I could purchase a scarf and the lady responded, "You know these aren't on sale right?" Then dismissed me. I replied, "Yes, ma'am. I know." Then as I was checking out she said, "Oh  so this must be a gift for someone right?" Still not believing I could purchase the accessory and I said, "No ma'am. It's for me." Then I wore the scarf out. It was a Pretty Woman moment for me.

Then as I was checking out she said, "Oh  so this must be a gift for someone right?" Still not believing I could purchase the accessory and I said, "No ma'am. It's for me." Then I wore the scarf out. It was a Pretty Woman moment for me.

originalText.text: I ordered a CD set from the Met Opera Shop.  It was a very reasonable price for a vintage 3-cd opera.  However, the first disc did not play, even though the other 2 discs were perfect.  When I emailed to tell them the problem, they immediately sent me a complete new set, free of charge, without even asking for the original discs to be returned.  This shows the dedication and excellent service of an organization that treats their customers the way we all want to be treated.  I am very impressed with the Met Opera Shop and intend to continue to order from them in person as well as online.
